LanguageData.ZP_Soymilk.label: Soy milk
LanguageData.ZP_Soymilk.description: A dairy substitute created by pressing soybeans.\nYou can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
LanguageData.ZP_Flour.label: Flour
LanguageData.ZP_Flour.description: A once proud grain that waved in the wind, but was then crushed, obliterated, and perfected into a fine powder.
